com.brightcove.onceux.event

Class ProgressEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.onceux.event.ProgressEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener

    public class ProgressEventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventListener
    Provide a default private class to deal with PROGRESS events by capturing the current segment and handling any uncompleted seek operations.

public void processEvent(Event event)

      • getSegmentIndex

        public int getSegmentIndex()
        The current segment index.
        Returns:
        -1 if the segment index has not yet been established, the current segment index otherwise.

      • getToken

        public int getToken()
        The token used for removing the handler.
        Returns:
        -1 if the handler is to remain alive, or a positive integer value to allow it to be removed.
